summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an individual to appear before the grand jury on July 24, 2019, to testify and produce documents related to alleged violations of federal sex trafficking and conspiracy statutes. The document includes an 'Advice of Rights' notice and a request to keep the subpoena confidential.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued the grand jury subpoena and signed the accompanying letter requesting confidentiality of the investigation.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance
events.description: The subpoena commands the recipient to appear before the grand jury at the U.S. Courthouse in Manhattan to testify and produce documents.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: The grand jury subpoena was issued and dated by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
The Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The subpoena is part of an official criminal investigation into suspected felony violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 1591 (sex trafficking), 2421 (transportation for prostitution), 2422 (coercion and enticement), 2423 (transportation of minors), and 371 (conspiracy).
The U.S. Attorney's Office requested the recipient voluntarily refrain from disclosing the existence of the subpoena to any third party to preserve the confidentiality of the investigation.
The recipient is commanded to appear before the grand jury on July 24, 2019, at 10:00 a.m. at the U.S. Courthouse in Manhattan.
The document includes an 'Advice of Rights' notice informing the recipient of their right against self-incrimination and right to counsel.
